glsa.title: zlib: Denial of service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: The zlib library contains a Denial of Service vulnerability.

background.p: zlib is a general-purpose data-compression library.

description.p: zlib contains a bug in the handling of errors in the "inflate()" and "inflateBack()" functions.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch a Denial of Service attack on any application using the zlib library.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are encouraged to upgrade to the latest available version of zlib.

resolution.p: All zlib users should upgrade to the latest version:
You should also run revdep-rebuild to rebuild any packages that depend on older versions of zlib :
